definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: To add some glamour, you could wear a silkscarf as a belt.
sentences.chinese: 想看起來更加魅力十足，你可以把絲巾當成皮帶用。

sentences.english: First of all, the main part can be cut and sewn into a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 首先呢，將裁下主體部份，拷邊縫成一條絲巾。

sentences.english: I bought a great tie-dyed silk scarf .
sentences.chinese: 我買了條非常好的扎染絲巾。

sentences.english: Wrap yourself in your best bright clothes, your red and purple scarves of silk.
sentences.chinese: 披起妳最耀眼的白衫，與那紅紫色的絲巾。

sentences.english: on a single day recently she received a folding fan a necklace and a silk scarf.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天她收到了一把摺扇，一條項鍊和一條絲巾。

sentences.english: The offerings are in stark contrast to the brand’s colorful trademark silk scarves.
sentences.chinese: 這些產品同該品牌的彩色商標絲巾形成強烈對比。

sentences.english: There's plenty of space in my suitcase for your clothes and the silk scarves.
sentences.chinese: 我的行李廂裏有充足空間放你的衣服和絲巾。

sentences.english: Also can hang filar towel on clothes tree, secure with clothes-pin.
sentences.chinese: 也可將絲巾掛在衣架上，並用衣夾固定。

sentences.english: A wrap dress, chains and scarves with low knots have the same effect.
sentences.chinese: 要想取得同樣效果可搭配連衣裙，項鍊或是低結絲巾。

sentences.english: He removed some old silk handkerchiefs that were lying on its top and blew away a bit of dust.
sentences.chinese: 他挪開了一些搭在面上的舊的絲巾又吹掉了些灰塵。

sentences.english: This scarf makes the finishing point of the clothes she wears today.
sentences.chinese: 這條絲巾爲她今天的服裝起到了畫龍點睛的作用。

sentences.english: I hasten to remove the mother's flower scarf to shake the peacock.
sentences.chinese: 我趕緊取下媽媽的花絲巾，向孔雀抖動着。

sentences.english: These silk scarves are made in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 這些絲巾產自於義大利。

sentences.english: This salesman has specialized in selling kefiyah scarves with typical Iraqi designs.
sentences.chinese: 這名伊拉克人在敘利亞販賣伊拉克特色絲巾。

sentences.english: The bandanna would have hidden her burning ears.
sentences.chinese: 絲巾會藏著她的燃燒耳朵。
